messageDateFullyOccupied: We are sorry, we are already booked on the date selected! There are {{remainingPersonCount}} places left on the booked activity.
messageDatePartiallyOccupied: We already have a booking on the date selected, but you can still join this activity. There are {{remainingPersonCount}} places left on the booked activity.
messageDateAllWithExceededPersonCount: We are sorry, all activities are unavailable because person count exceeds their maximum capacity.
messageDateSomeWithExceededPersonCount: Some activities are unavailable because person count exceeds their maximum capacity.
bookingStepTripInformationDescription: Provide information about your trip to get started
bookingStepActivitiesDescription: Select activities for days within selected date range
bookingStepHotelsDescription: Select hotel or hotels for days within selected date range
bookingStepConfirmDescription: Provide contact data and confirm booking
bookingNoActivitySelectedDescription: Select a day and add activity to it using the list below
